Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
AddDescriptionToTitle_Description: If set to true, both title and description will be displayed for event in calendar grid
AllowTasks_Description: Setting to true enables tasks-related features such as converting event to task and back
AllowShare_Description: Setting to true enables calendar sharing capabilities (Aurora Corporate only)
DefaultTab_Description: Defines default calendar tab. All the settings starting from this one are applied to new accounts, and can be adjust by users in their settings.
HighlightWorkingDays_Description: If true, 'Highlight working days' option is enabled
HighlightWorkingHours_Description: If true, 'Highlight working hours' option is enabled
WeekStartsOn_Description: Defines first day of the week: 0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, 6 - Saturday
AllowPrivateEvents_Description: Setting to true enables private events features
AllowDefaultReminders_Description: Setting to true enables default reminders features
